name: R'lyeh (pepnou)
description:
Embark in an adventure (great catchphrase) in the city of R'lyeh. 

The doom of mankind is near anyway, will you be able to haste it ? Create sacrifices to rip open the doorway between worlds.

Just to be sure: clicking on the portal launches the game.

Made in 2 days with unity (game engine), aseprite (sprite editor), audacity (sound recorder/editor), voltage modular (modular synth)
